headline: GM’s Bolt Is Back, and Inexpensive. It’s a Challenge for Tesla.
summary: General Motors unveiled the 2027 Chevy Bolt electric vehicle. The price starts at less than $30,000.

raw.headline: GM’s Bolt Is Back, and Inexpensive. It’s a Challenge for Tesla.

headline: Factory Zero employees remain on layoff through end of year
summary: The layoffs impact production of the GMC Hummer EV and Cadillac Escalade IQ, the company said.

headline: GM Launches 2027 Chevrolet Bolt
summary: GM is bringing back its Chevrolet Bolt with a new model that it expects to account for much of its electric-vehicle volume next year.

raw.headline: GM Launches 2027 Chevrolet Bolt
raw.summary: GM is bringing back its Chevrolet Bolt with a new model that it expects to account for much of its electric-vehicle volume next year.

headline: General Motors dishes out worrying update for EV buyers
summary: For the past couple of years, the EV story has been a mix of momentum and growing pains. Prices plummeted, supply chains stabilized, and adoption rates increased. However, the effects of these positives were more than offset by heightened interest rates, charging gaps, and stubborn affordability ...

raw.headline: General Motors dishes out worrying update for EV buyers

However, the effects of these positives were more than offset by heightened interest rates, charging gaps, and stubborn affordability ...

headline: Novelis faces extended factory closure after fire, impacting auto supply chain
summary: The major aluminum sheet maker will keep the hot mill in its Oswego, New York, plant closed until early 2026.

raw.headline: Novelis faces extended factory closure after fire, impacting auto supply chain
raw.summary: The major aluminum sheet maker will keep the hot mill in its Oswego, New York, plant closed until early 2026.

headline: GM withdraws plan to extend EV tax credits after policy scrutiny – report
summary: According to sources, the reversal follows concerns raised by Ohio's Republican Senator Bernie Moreno.

raw.headline: GM withdraws plan to extend EV tax credits after policy scrutiny – report
raw.summary: According to sources, the reversal follows concerns raised by Ohio's Republican Senator Bernie Moreno.

headline: Lithium Americas (TSX:LAC) Is Up 12.0% After DOE Takes Rare Equity Stake in Thacker Pass Deal
summary: Lithium Americas Corp. announced the finalization of amendments to its US$2.23 billion U.S. Department of Energy loan for Thacker Pass, with terms that include deferral of US$184 million in early debt service and the DOE receiving a 5% equity stake through warrants. This arrangement marks a rare instance of the U.S. government taking a direct equity interest in a domestic critical minerals producer, alongside the involvement of General Motors and expanded offtake agreements for project...
